articles.title: SBI Card slumps as asset quality deteriorates, brokerages cut target price - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Brokerages have a bleak outlook. Morgan Stanley has downgraded SBI Card stock to 'equal weight' and reduced the price to Rs 750 from Rs 950
